name: Skies Above (Krogal)
description:
Find all the memories scattered around the mysterious floating islands...

The aim of this project was to practice my design skills, using the "Unreal Engine Hour of Code" project from the Epic Games Marketplace. I wanted to provide a good playable experience that was fit with the assets provided, so I decided upon a chill, exploration based platformer, with a relaxing yet mysterious tone, while also adding a bit of narrative.

Feel free to share your feedback in the comments section :D
